description: Earth Breaker is a puzzle game where elements must be combined in particular patterns to earn the most points as possible.  The objective of Earth Breaker is to score as many points as possible within the allotted time frame.  Once two Elements have been selected, they will cause the Chain Reaction. A Chain Reaction will cause all other nearby Elements of the same color to explode. Chain Reactions will continue until it reaches an Element with no other nearby Elements of the same color.   Longer Chain Reactions will earn more points! Can you create a reaction that causes every Element on the screen to explode?
